unnormalised: Boro, India-nthle emergency medicine vishayant konnain tori vicharlem, barobar? Hanv tumkam eka utki-ntoch sangpak yatn kortam. Hanga emergency medicine, khas korun vhoddlea xharanim, kaim promannant sudhorta asa, punn torui America vo UK-ache tulnent aizunui khub vhodd avhanam asat.
normalised: Boro, konnem Bharotantlea tatkaalik vaidyakiche vixim vicharlem, bare? Hanv tumkam ek tatkaalik vivron diunk proyotn kortam. Hangasor tatkaalik voizuki, khas korun vhoddlea xarani, zaiti bori zata, punn U-S vo U-K hache tulnen azun legit kain mukhil avhan asat.

unnormalised: Poilem mhonnllear, ambulance melloun gheunk. 108 service deshbhor astoli mhonn sangla, punn respondancho vell veg-vegllo astat. Mumbai sarkhea metro xarant, tumkam 15-20 minttant mellunk xakta, punn ek lhan ganvant vo gramin bhagant, taka ani khuib vell lagunk xakta - mhonnllear eka horak vo ani khuib. Jednam tumi kallzak lagun zata vo eka bhirnkul apghatant astole, tevhann hem khuib mhotvachem asta. Tankam khub fundi ani borem infrastructureachi khub goroz asa.
normalised: Poilem mhunllear, ambulance melloupak. Ek xunn dhatt sewa deshbhor asunk zai, punn protikriya divopachem vell veg-vegllem asta. Mumbai xaran tumkam pondra te vis minuteanim mellunk xakta, punn ek lhan ganvant vo gramin ilakent zaito vell lagunk xakta- kiteak tor eka vorak legit. Jea vellar kallzak dhoko vo bhayanak opghat zatat tea vellar hem ek vhodd vixo vortouta. Tankam kharach zaiti nidhi ani bori buniyad sodunk zai.

unnormalised: Magir pre-hospital care-ache vishay asa. Khub ambulancenk advanced training divpi paramedics nashtat. Dhaktte premannant, ek driver ani sadhe EMT astat. Mhonnllear, hospitalak vetona advanced airway management vo kaim meds divop sarkea vostu khuib kami astat. Trainingant sudhar korunk khuib sandhi asat ani ambulance-acho staff toyar korunk.
normalised: Uprant ghara bhailchea dekhbalicho prosn asa. Zaitim ambulanceanim paramedics naim jimchea lagim fuddlem proxikxonn asa. Xero astana, ek driver asta ani sadho E-M-T asta. Mhunnun, hospitlant vochchea rastent mukhiche margacho niyantron vo kain vokhdam divop durmill zata. Ambulance karmachareache proxikxonnan ani tankam sadhan divpant sudharna korpak zai.

unnormalised: Aata hospitalachem sangta. Apollo vo Fortis sarkhea vhoddlea private hospitalsanim toyar zalole emergency departments astat zantunt trained doctors ani nurses astat. Te khuib emergencies handle korunk xaktat, trauma cases thaun cardiac arrests poriant. Punn treatmentacho kharch khub lokank ek vhodd addakhi asonk xakta. Ekech bheti-k Rs. 20,000 vo ani khuib lagunk xaktat, ani treatment-acho zanno na.
normalised: Atam, hospitlanche vixim. Apollo vo Fortis sarke mukhil khasgi hospitlanim proxikxonn divpi voiz ani nurses astana bori sadhna asta. Tankam trauma caseanim kallzachea dhadpachinchea ghaddnnukanim zaito dekhbal divunk zata. Punn zaitench lokank hem voizukechem kharch dukh divpak xakta. Fuddli dekhbhal asinasthan ek bhonvddi rupia vis hazar vo odhik lagpak xakta.

unnormalised: Govt. hospitals, dusrea hatant, khub sopim asta, punn te khuib bharele astat ani staff chodd nashta. Tumi khuib vell vatek lagunk xakta, bhirnkul conditionanim pasun. Samball divpachem gunnottam veg-vegllem asonk xakta. Doctors sogle khuib borem asat (khub MDs vo DNBs astat emergency medicinant), te dhaktte premannant phatrallelle astat. Infrastructure sudhorta punn aizunui private sectorak fattim asa. Ani documentation ek bhirnkul tras!
normalised: Dusrea vatten, sorkari hospital sadharn asat punn tanche kodden zaito lok asta ani karbhari komi astat. Gambhir haltin legit tumkam ravpak lagta. Dekhbalichi gunvatta badlunk xakta. Voizank sadharnponni proxikxonn mellta (zaitech M-Ds vo D-N-Bs tatkalik voizukent asat), punn tankam zaitench kam korchem poddta. Buniyad sudharta astana, khasgi vibhagant komi asta. Ani kagdopotrikachem kam bhayanak asta!

unnormalised: Ek vhodd problem mhonnllear lokanchi jagruti. Khuib lokanim poili upai vo CPR-vixin kainch mahiti na. Hem ek vhodd bodol hadunk xakta. Kalpok dium konnain tori cardiac arrestak lagun poddla, ani aju-bajuche lok chest compressions suru korunk shokna – ti ek nashtam kel’li sandhi. Lokak emergency-ak koxem respond karchem sangpak lokshikshanache campaigns asonk zai. Kaim mhonnllear, “konnain tori poddla tor dhum vorta asa ki na te polloun 100-120 daranim chest compressions suru kor.”
normalised: Ek vhodd problem mhunllear lokank zannvikai nasta. Zaiteank mullchi dekhbhal vo C-P-R mahit na. Hachem porinnamancher vhodd farak poddta. Konnaiek kallzachem sankott astat ani bhair axil'le lok chest compressions diunk xakonant - ti ek sandleli sondhi asa. Lokank tatkalik haltin protikriya divpak shikhoupak zai. Kiteak tor, "konn kollap zata ani sans gheunk xakonam zalear ek minttak ekxim te ekxim vis mhunnon chest compressions divpak zai".

unnormalised: Xevottak, traffic! Bangalore vo Delhi sarkhea traffic-achin bharllea xharanim hospitalak vochon khuib trasacho vishay zatat. Siren vajta astana pasun, ambulance jamant adakunk xakta. Kaim xhar ambulances-achea khatir “green corridors” toyar korpak yatn kortat, punn aizunui te kam cholta. Hanvem ek case aikolam zantunt ek patientache jivit gelem kiteak to hosp-ak vellak pauko shoklona kiteak traffic ani VIP bhonvteak vochpak rostanche bandh zatale.
normalised: Xevttak, yetayat! Bangalore vo Delhi sarkhea yetayatin duddun bhorelea xaran hospitlant vochop ek avhan vortouta. Sirena vazoitanam legit, ambulance yetayatint asrunk xakta. Kain xaram ambulanceanim vochpak "green corridors" toyar kortat, punn tem azun legit chaluch asa. Mhojek ek kissa aikol'lo zoim ek patientak jivo sanddlo kiteak tor V-I-P chalnachi rastobandi axil'lean hospitlant vochpak vell laglo.

unnormalised: Mhonnllear, India-nthle emergency medicine vikas zata, punn aizunui khuib addkakhe asaun vollondun vochk asa. Bori ambulance services, paramedic-achea khatir sudhar kel’lem training, sopit arogy sambhall, lokanchi vhodd jagruti, ani traffic-acho problem sodounk - he sogle utponnant sudhar korpak khub mhotvache astat. Tumka training naka astolem tor, KEM Mumbai khuib borem asa. Mhaka dishta hem tumkam upkarak zatolem.
normalised: Mhunnun, Bharotant tatkalik voizuki bodlota, punn zaiti addkhollank par korpak zai. Bori ambulance sewa, paramedicsak borem proxikxonn, vostik dekhbhal, vhodd lokzannvikai, ani yetayaticho problem sodvop- hem soglle farak poddta. Tumkam hanga proxikxonn zai zalear, K-E-M Mumbai borem asa. Mhaka dista hem upyogi zait.
